name: Simplicity (Priptide)
description:
So before you go mental at me read our story in the game it explains a lot and lets hope next time is better.

This game is inspired by old school games where being skilled with movement is useful and helps you progress through the level

Controls:

W/A/S/D = Move

Space = Jump

R = Restart (Doesn't reset time sorry but its a challenge :) )

M = Menu

Q = Quit (Most pressed button probably)

P.S. Post your fastest times in the chat!
